content.detailedDescription:
Yellow orb traveled from one picture to another picture in living room
didn't know what to think but
not life threatening
it lasted 20  minutes and then disappeared
 
a bigger object 2 miles away with a hazy yellow color traveled east to west over over the houses
subject has seen yellow slow moving orbs with an irregular paths at night time between 8 to 9 pm
 
subject is experiencing telepathic communications that maybe related to orbs

subject has stated the telepathic communications come from outside his house in neighbors yard 

the telepathic communications harass him and he doesn't feel like its a ghost or spirit from what he's read or people he's talked to
content.summary: Yellow orb traveled from one picture to another in living room

content.detailedDescription:
While on front porch subject saw a orange sparkling orb travel across the sky and then come over his house and hover and then execute a 45 degrees turn and leave very fast to the east
subject said orb started out orange and sparkling and then changed shape to oblong and turned colors of the rainbow
subject managed to take seven pictures of the orb.
subject said it was a clear sky with a full moon
subject has taken flying lessons and knows it was not a airplane
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: One evening saw an orange sparkling craft cross the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Subjects saw what they thought at first was the moon over the ocean off pacific coast highway at 4am near crystal cove
they realized it was not the moon
it was gray and had gassy swirling clouds around it as it hovered over
the water  it would get brighter with the gray swirling gassy clouds and then get dimmer
then it would get brighter, but not as bright as before and then dim
then it would get brighter, but once again not as bright as before
it finally dimmed out altogether and was gone
the subjects stopped the car and watched the event for 20 minutes on the side of the road.
the subject was the wife of a test pilot and knew at once this was not an aircraft 
subject contacted the coast guard and they confirmed one of their cooks had also seen the moon sized gassy floating orb over the water, and had also seen it disappear.
content.summary: 1961 driving down pch saw moon size enity hovering over water

content.detailedDescription:
Something in the late eighties early nineties
while coming home on a foggy evening, with his wife about 9pm 
subject came to the intersection of slater and goldenwest in huntington beach
while waiting for a red light the sky lite up like daylight 
the whole intersection was filled with a brilliant white light
then it disappeared
the subject who worked in aviation, called the long beach tower and
asked if they had seen the light  
they replied they had seen it and it was gone towards santa barbara very fast
subject has not seen any lights since, but since he worked in aviation he
fully knew what lights to expect from air craft and this was not normal
content.summary: While coming home in late 80's in fog saw brilliant light in intersestion

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On may 31st at 11:00 i went out in my back yard to throw the ball for my dog. while she was retrieving it, i glanced at the s/sw sky and saw and saw an object with 2 red light & 1 green light high in the sky. the lights were very bright, brighter than i've ever seen on an aircraft. they were in a triangle shape but were close together, it looked as if they were touching. the lights were round and didn't blink or change. i couldn't see an actual craft. the sky was slightly lit from city lights. the object descended then hovered, then moved east where my neighbor's tree partially blocked the view. then it came back out from behind the tree and moved west, descending further. it was quite close. then it came back east and moved farther south, then moved closer in my direction (north) and then descended below my fence line. it appeared twice more before 11:30, both times from the west moving southeast, and both times descended out of my line of sight. at it's closest point it might've been several miles away. it was a tangible object, not lights beaming from the ground. it looked like i could've reached up & plucked it out of the sky. it moved too slow to be an airplane & changed directions quickly & stopped & hovered several times. it moved too fast to be a helicopter & made no noise that i could hear. it was way too big to be a toy but it wasn't huge. i've never seen anything even remotely like it. i was so intrigued. i tried to get photos/ video with my camera & phone but they just show a glowing dot, it looks nothing like what i actually saw. afterward i googled everything i could think of but i have no idea what it was. but i know it was under intelligent control because of it's movement.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright lights, 2 red & 1green, all on one object. flew in different directions and started high in the sky then descended. it went below my sight line so i don't know if it landed but i saw it return 3 times & fly around.

content.detailedDescription: The object we saw for around 15 min, i heard many people nearby also looked at the object and noticed its no plane, had a eratic movement and flashed .
content.summary: It appeared sort of boomerang, first we thought its a plane

content.detailedDescription:
Observation of unidentified flying objects in franklin county, kentucky
on saturday may 31, 2014, at approximately 10:00 pm my wife and i observed 10 or more orange balls of light in a perfect straight line formation at an altitude of approximately 1000-1500 feet.  the balls of light seem to appear one after the other and were not all visible initially.  all but one of the orange lights stayed in formation the entire time we watched.  one of the lights rapidly accelerated next to another orange light and remained side by side with the other light until they disappeared.  the orange lights were flying northwest, were evenly spaced approximately 200-300 yards apart and silent.  we watched the lights for approximately five minutes until they made a turn towards southwest and disappeared as they were moving away from our location.  the orange objects did not have any strobes, sound, red or white light.
i have worked on numerous military bases, have been an investigator for the state government for more than 13 years, traveled internationally and have flown on private and commercial planes and helicopters.  i have never observed flying objects like we saw on may 31, 2014.  i am 100% certain they were not ���chinese lanterns���, helicopters or planes.  the flying objects had to be controlled by intelligent life due to the exact positioning of the objects, formation and the rapid acceleration of one object next to the other that remained side by side until they disappeared.  i have observed planes and helicopters flying at night and these were definitely neither.  the sky was clear over frankfort and little to no wind.  
before reporting this incident we consulted with two air force officers and they are unaware of any aircraft that are silent or displays orange lights rather than the traditional lights used on aircraft during flight.  i had serious reservations about reporting the incident because i have never believed in ufos.  i am not sure what these were but, by reporting this incident i hope to find some answers no matter what they may be.
content.summary: 10 or more unidentified flying objects in strict straight line formation until one accelerated rapidly next to the other and remained until they disappeared.  the objects were equally spaced and remained that way.  objects were silent, had orange light.

content.detailedDescription:
My son was walking home from school on monday 2nd june 2014 in the vicinity of eascote near pinner (north west london). as he walked passed a man and a small girl walking in the opposite direction to him he noticed an object in the sky. my son observed that the object was a disc shaped and hovering just below cloud level at a distance of up to half a mile from him. he was at first confused by what he was looking at as it did not resemble a conventional aircraft. he turned around to see if the man had seen it too but the man and the small child had already walked around the corner on to the next street. the time was 4:17pm. my son then observed the grey disc shaped object as it maintained a hovering but stationary position. he described seeing the underbelly of the object and the rim of the object for some 10 to 15 seconds. he later pointed out to me that it must have been a fairly large object as he estimated it to be at least half a mile away. he took a photograph of the object with his smart phone camera and continued to look at the disc. my son then observed that the craft then started to change its colour by blotching different areas of its undercarriage to match the cloud around it. he observed this change of colour for up to seven seconds before the craft completely disappeared from view. at no time during this transformation did the craft move position and neither did it make a sound that he could detect. my son said that he had the distinct impression that the craft was still there but had somehow cleverly masked itself to the naked eye.

upon witnessing the disappearance but feeling it was still present my son  become scared. he rang his mother to tell her what he had seen and then ran the rest of the way home.
content.summary: Ufo spotted hovering over eastcote, near pinner, london.

content.detailedDescription: I walked onto my porch for a cigarette and looked up at planet mercury or venus whichever one is bright in the morning in the eastern sky before sunrise just like i always do because it looks pretty cool, and i noticed there was another bright light about ten o clock feom the planet. this was strange. there is usually no other bright light in the sky like except the lone planet. the other bright object stayed there for about three seconds then to my absolute surprise the light, which i thought was just another star, suddenly moved to the left for about three seconds at a constant rate ( not too fast) and then just vanished. it looked like it sort of imploded and it was gone. i know what i saw. i'm out here every morning and there is only one orb of light in the eastern sky before the sunrise, and that is a planet. this other light did not belong there. and suddenly it left.  this took place around 4:45 am on june 4th,2014. i don't know what to make of it. but i do know that it was not a geese, or swamp gas or a weather balloon. trust me. it was spectacular in the least. i felt moved by it. as if it wanted me to just see it and then vanish. the whole event lasted about seven seconds but that's more than enough time for me to know what i saw.
content.summary: Object was 10o clock from planet mercury then left

content.detailedDescription: I was smoking a cigarette on my back porch around 11:40pm wednesday june 3rd, 2014. i was gazing up at the stars on the clear night when i noticed a star-like light appear above the tree-line. i watched as it slowly traversed the sky over my head. initially i assumed it to be an aircraft, but the more i stared at it, i realized it was a single sphere of light. it did not have multiple lights or any blinking light, just a solid ball of white light. it was fairly slow moving, but it's speed varied at times. it took roughly three minutes for it to travel roughly a mile plus over my neighborhood and out of view behind a neighbors house. it appeared just as a bright white star in the sky, but only about a mile high. its path was not fixed, i caught it from the west and watched it meander from heading east to the northeast. it moved quietly and smoothly, occasionally slowing and for a split second slowing to a hover. the light never changed, viewed as a bright glowing white orb. it made a few random turns, but they were ever so slight and very smooth. i am an avid stargazer, i have witnessed many planes and helicopters over the course of my few years living in bremerton near multiple military bases. i have also witnessed multiple satellites as well as meteor showers. this is the first time i have seen anything move like this across the sky, silently as a single uniform white light. i am still perplexed by what i saw.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single solid glowing light lazily hovered overhead across night sky changing speed direction

content.detailedDescription: June 3 about 4:25 am eastern tine 2 of us saw a bright object in the night sky travailing from northwest to southeast at a very high rate of speed bright white in color no noise at all no tail to indicate a meteor no flashing lights at all went in a strait line much faster than the satellite we were observing not much else to say  we were standing out back looking at the sky before work. noticed it moving fast.Thought at first it was a satellite.But to fast and to bright to be.We were very interested in finding out what it was.Then we lost sight of it behind the roofs of the other houses.
content.summary: Bright light travaling fast

content.detailedDescription: They keep flying around from all directions but never in formation and some planes fly by close to them maybe under i think. these ufo white orbs been appearing in lake of the woods since april but this night must of been over 15 and that's just the one's i seen. i tried to use a laptop to record them but can't focus the lens on the sky. the horizon here is really clear lake of the woods canada. a couple times it seemed like the objects fly over me like they can see me or not sure who knows.
content.summary: These white ufo things keep flying all over the place with no sound i been seeing them since april but this night never seen so much i got scared plus seen some planes and a few shooting stars maybe a satellite it's weird

content.detailedDescription:
Mon nom est christiane chiantesse, et lors d'un s��jour il y a quelques jours au maroc j'ai pu observer un triangle noir survoler le centre de recherche nucl��aire de maamora pres de rabat.

les faits sont les suivants: 

lev�� aux aurores afin de visiter la belle for��t de maamora proche de rabat, accompagn�� de moustapha abdellader guide et une amie, mich��le xxx, nois avons pu observer l'��trange man��ge d'un triangle noir survolant le centre de recherches nucl��aires de maamora lorsque nous l'avons contourn�� par le sud.

l'observation a dur��e environ six minutes et commen����t �� 7h du matin environ.

moustapha a observ�� un objet du coin de l'oeil en conduisant tandis que mich��le et moi conversions �� divers propos. arrivant du sud, survolant la for��t �� hauteur de cimes des arbres, un triangle noir de taille ��quivalente a celle d'un avion de chiasse est pass�� non loin de nous.

lors de son passage, le v��hicule s'est arr��t�� comme par magie, nos appareils photos ont ��galement ��t�� affect��s avec l'impossibilit�� de filmer ce singulier ��v��nement.

le triangle s'est arr��t�� comme tenu en l'air par un fil invisible de fa��on stationnaire au dessus des b��timents du centre de recherches que nous devinions au loin , �� 2 kilom��tres peut ��tre.

il est ainsi rest�� approximativement six minutes avant de reprendre un cap sud/ sud ouest.

cet ��v��nement nous a tous profond��ment marqu��s de par son ��tranget��.

de retour en france, j'ai commenc�� de me,renseigner sur internet sur ce type d'observations et ai trouv�� un cas similaire au dessus d'une centrale nucl��aire fran��aise �� golfech.
content.summary: Triangle noir au stationnaire au dessus d'une centrale nucleaire

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside on the porch. looking at the sky as i always do on clear nights. ever since moving to san diego i have witnessed hundreds of ufos. this one i had to report. it was flying west from the east. then it hovered i was looking at a rooftop of a the house to make sure it wasn't moving past certain point. it hovered for a few minutes. then it got amazingly bright. it had looked like 3 lights in one. then it vanished but was like it left behind a redness in the sky for brief second. there was no blinking lights whatsoever. about 2 months ago some friends and i were outside and i noticed hundreds of them in daylight. i see them so often in san diego and have plenty of pictures to share. they must like the weather too. the most memorable ufo experience was when i was a child in byron georgia. i was at my grandparents and all the family was there. it was night time. we were out in the street and a huge ufo landed on the railroad tracks. i remember it just like it was yesterday. it was oval and had lights in the middle round ones with separation in between. it must of been 2 regular sized blocks away. my uncles ran to see it up closer and it flew away. ever since i've seen them. none like the detail of that first one and the one i saw tonight.
content.summary: The 2nd biggest ufo i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
I was stargazing very high in the sky to the north, towards the big dipper when i realized i had been seeing various flashes in my peripheral vision and i decided to focus my attention on them. i saw a fast moving object flashing, with a fairly regular pattern of two flashes in less than a quarter second, then a gap of about three quarters of a second. after observing a first pair of flashes, i concluded that the object was a fast moving airplane. however, when the next pair of flashes began less than a second later, the object was moving in a completely different direction, perhaps about 135 degrees off from its original heading. it didn't seem possible for an airplane to turn so quickly and completely. 

the flashing light continued this rapid darting behavior, changing its heading seemingly almost at random with each pair of flashes. after seeing each pair of flashes, i could roughly guess where the next would appear, but the position and particularly the heading would always surprise me somewhat when the next pair of flashes occurred. it gave the impression of a pinball being bounced rapidly around by bumpers.

over the course of about 90 seconds, the object bounced its way to the west, and finally over to the southern sky, where i lost it behind some trees. there was no sound at any time.

i watched the sky closely for about 30 minutes thereafter, and i spotted the light twice more, after roughly five minutes intervals. in both cases, i observed it near the big dipper where i had first seen it before, and in both cases i only had about 20 seconds to observe it before it went behind trees or my house. however, there was one amazing pair of flashes (again, separated by less than a quarter second) when the object performed a complete 180 degree reversal between the two flashes.

after that, i watched the sky with gradually decreasing attentiveness for about another hour, and i didn't see anything else of interest. there were commercial airplanes in the sky off to the south while i was observing the flashing object, but they had no apparent interactions with it. 

my impression was that the object was high up and far away, but i cannot rule out the possibility that it may have been closer, though it must have been at least above tree level, since it regularly disappeared behind the trees. 

as an amateur astronomer, i am highly familiar with the appearance and behavior of aircraft, satellites, and meteors in the night sky, and this phenomenon appeared to be none of these.
content.summary: A flashing white light that darted about the sky with incredible agility

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the city of bessemer visiting with some relatives. as my family and i loaded everything in the car, which was facing directly east, i observed a bright star like object appear about 100-200ft. above the tree line. i commented to my child, "there's a fo'"; which has become our accustomed slang way of referring to these almost daily seen objects.  he excitedly replied, "where is it daddy?" and when i pointed at the object it began to visibly become lighter. the object became as bright as a car's headlights if they were set to bright. initially the object hovered just above the trees then it began a series of motions including descending, ascending, and multiple directional changes. we observed the object several minutes before it finally went out of view over the tree line. for an instant i thought about attempting to follow the object, but i did not want to place my family in jeopardy. after the object disappeared i called another family member that i knew should be located somewhere along the flight path i observed the object take. he did not see this first object; however, as i dialogued with him another star like object appeared at a much higher altitude directly in my line of sight as i faced east. this second object was flying along a straight flight path from the south headed north. this second object was flashing at an interval of about every 3 seconds following the same direction that the first object had taken. i asked my family member if he was able to observe this second object from his location and he answered in the affirmative.

*based upon what has been transpiring lately i continue to believe that these objects are either targeting myself or are seeking to be recognized in some way. a similar object was seen several hours later; for this i will be submitting a separate report.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright star like object seen over the city of bessemer, al

content.detailedDescription:
I left to go walking/jogging at 8:15pm cst.  i was looking at the skybthinking dusk was fast approaching.  i look to my right, in the south, i saw four ufo's. they.Fkrmed a diamond pattern as they flew together.  they stayed flat and went on an angle  lik .To get a better view of whatever they were looking at.  with four of them, i found it odd that there was no noise, not even a faint peep.  with the size each one there should have a noise. there was one more witness to the sighting.  i dont.Know her.  i saw her jogging before, in the past.  
the objects were smoky grey to a dark grey color. disk,circular with details.  for ir, another circle shape on the bottom.  on top, it had a rounded.Top, perhaps an observation deck for the riders to look outside.
content.summary: Four ufo's diamond formation, flew south.To north, no sound, dark grey opaque

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a security guard at the beach park and observed a bright light lift from the connecticut side of the long island sound and make its way toward the long island side. finally when the craft was close enough to the shore i got out of my car and observed a reflective cylinder raft made no sound and the bright light on the tip of the craft seem to scan the land, the craft was close enough that i would have been able to throw a baseball at it. it slowly flew over head and disappeared over the tree tops. seeing the craft i was frozen with wonder of what i had just witnessed.
content.summary: Cylinder shaped craft appear over long island sound

content.detailedDescription:
In 1987 i saw the documentary ufo cover up and learnt about the greys, and the sightings at gulfbreeze florida. and being an ignorant teenager, i promised myself when i turned 18, i was going to make a trip there. so after i graduated high school in 1989, i took a trip to gulfbreeze. the drive was exhasting, i thought it would be only a few hour drive from tampa, but instead it took eight. when i arrived it was dusk. i found a neighborhood still being developed and found a neighborhood circle that was undeveloped. i parked my little dodge colt and lied atop my car staring at the sky. i had not enough money for a hotel. the sky was clear, and i feel it's important for me to mention that i do not remember seeing a cloud in the sky the whole drive to gulfbreeze. after roughly 15 minutes staring at the starry sky, i started to zone out. but then noticed a fireball-like thing moving around in the sky, it changed colors from red, yellow blue, etc. and seem to be slowly moving about in no clear direction. it was moving in circular patterns. then i noticed another fireball further away. they continued to do these circular motions and changing colors. they were pretty high in the sky, but not high enough to be satillites. not even close. to where i viewed them, i made them out the size of a golfball, but a little smaller. after awhile, it had gotten pretty boring, they continued this motion and i again, started to zone out. then to my left i saw a low flying cloud rapidly floating in my way until it engulfed the whole sky then stopped! this cloud was no more than 50 feet high. i jumped off of my car and was at awe, my hair raised from my body and i just knew there was something in the middle of this cloud and my naive self was going to meet an alien. but instead, it slowly started to move to the right again, and away it went. i noticed that the tail of the cloud was being stretched in the opposite direction as the if the wind was blowing in the opposite direction of the cloud. hoping to see more i jumped back on the car only to be overwelmed my mosquitoes. i was forced to retreat in my car with the windows up. i witnessed a shooting star, and another shooting star along the same path 15 minutes later. suddenly, it had gotten extremly hot in my car. i had no ac in my car and  once again was overwhelmed and was forced to leave.  last year, i came across the phil schneider video on the net and was appalled by his testimony. a few days later, i noticed a bump on my left ear. i automatically thought it was an implant...But was also aware that i might be acting paranoid. so i had my family doctor look at it who sent me to a specialist who in turn said it was probably a cartilage build up. i didn't tell him what i thought it was especially after being ridiculed by my wife.
 the surgery was performed and something was removed. the doctor told me it was a dark sustance he believed to be cartilage enveloped in dry blood. he later gave me a call saying that they did tests on it and their team sent the sample to john hopkins for further study but assured me that it was not dangerous with nothing out of the ordinary. i assumed that it was just that and felt embarrassed i thought it was an implant. but, further researching implants online found that these implants were usually envelope in a dark membrane. again paranoia kicked in and i discussed it with my wife, which i regret doing. i'm trying to dismiss this, but then i came across a video on you tube called: ufo's the complete truth aliens among us interview with whitley strieber. whitley talks about an implant in his left ear (18:42), exactly where my surgery was performed. showing this video to my wife changed her attidude from ridicule to "when could they have done this?" well, this is the end of my tetimony, and i have to express that my gulfbreeze experience was really real to me, i know what i saw...But this implant theory is testing my sanity, and i'm going to be very embarrassed if i'm just being paranoid. if you feel my testomony is significant, and you want investigate further, i'm willing to take a polygraph test and go under hypnosis.  thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fire balls at gulfbreeze and an implant in my ear.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving going north on the street i was on in my car and i looked up and i seen an oval silver shaped object next to a cloud and then disappeared.
content.summary: Silver oval shapes

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside my front door to smoke a cigarette. i looked over and saw a bright orange light just hovering above the treeline. i was not sure what it was and i tried to get my husband's attention. the light just hovered in one place, there was no color change or pulsing. i was curious as to what it was. i poked my head into the house and kept looking back to see if it was still there. i looked back in a third time to get my husband and looked back out and it was gone.
content.summary: She walked outside to smoke and saw this bright orange orb, just sitting in the sky looked away to get my attention and it was gone

content.detailedDescription: Bright star-like whitish bright object with no fluctuation of color, traveling at least 2x's the rotation of the earth, traveling over us in a flight path nne without any sound or flashing beacons at level of iss or stars but moving at 2x's speed of earth's rotation. this was observed at our residence at approximately 9:55pm. we have a neighbor who returned home as we were looking up, at the sky before it disappeared from our sight. please google earth our address to verify flight path - nne.
content.summary: Very bright whitish light with straight flight path at constant speed with flyover no  sound 30 mile? high or better, iss height approximate, size 5x's + of iss but travel path nne straight line 70 seconds detection to out of sight of the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i decided after dinner to go outside and have a cigarette when almost immediately after lighting up we noticed a huge bright object moving slowly and quiet across the skyline. upon initial glance i thought it was just another chem trail until i further examined what i thought we were seeing. while observing the object i noticed how slowly it was moving and compared to the airplanes in the sky at the time running chem trails that it appeared to be emitting it's own light source. i live in a apartment complex surrounded by trees so we were unable to position ourselves to observe the object more than a few minutes before it disappeared behind the tree line.
content.summary: Massive bright glowing orb slowly moving across the alabama skyline.

content.detailedDescription: Ufos chased by fighter jets aspirated to be shot at but juked and moved out of planes attack faster then jets by 1000%
content.summary: Made mathematical movements in group chard by fighter planes out of dmab

content.detailedDescription: I was in the kitchen doing my nightly routine of making my lunch for work the next day and juicing. my fiance told me too take our dog outside for he can do his business before we bring him into the house for bedtime. well when me and my dog were outside i looked up just to take a look at how clear the sky was and check our the constellations while my dog wanted to play and i didn't,i told him to do his business. when i looked up again and noticed that one of the stars was on the move it was brighter than the others but if unnoticed would look average it started from the south end to move north in a straight path then i lost it past the others stars right before a plane was heading south. then i went to check the times and my watch was cycling through all modes it happened between 8:48 - 8:52pm
content.summary: What looked like a falling star that never fell, the star just flew north

content.detailedDescription:
My friend was visit mississipi in grenada county. i from strasbourg, friend tell me the story this:

last year in touristing mississipi, drive from place to place in camping car, he stop one night next field in county grenada.

his wife , him make dinner and get night time. they watch horizon and seeing object come from nord est , no noise, object round with windows lighted, visitors inside.

object landing in field next camping car parked but other objects come out very dark and small. the campong car is close to field with animals and the small dark circles flying above that animals. one object lazer beam the cow and make big screaming in calm night.

the night falling and the big land object having humanoid shape things coming from the object on the floor where is lazered cow. the friend tell me the visitoŕlook like the fish with costume astronaut , maybe water inside, it is what he thinking his wife also.

the fish astronaute make big jumping to the friend and he and wife get scaring of life. they saying the fish speaking withoutnmoith in the head of them and not moving mouth. saying the planet is destroying and the friend wife a,so must doing change for save planet of the coming war soon be in world. they seeing images of war like bigger ever seen same in horror film he tells me.

i think he crazy when telling story. since come back strasbourg, friend wife change lifestyle so maybe happen something there in the mississippi in grenada. the big changing his life style is what make me contacting you for saying his history not wanting to say public.

content.detailedDescription: Several craft, bad smells
content.summary: Sever moving  stars, 3 craft bad smells

content.detailedDescription: I was watching television around 10pm when a bright red light outside my window caught my eye. i anxiously rushed outside as i thought it was a ufo. i grabbed my phone and filmed what i could as the 3 lights slowly hovered, than ascended in the ne direction. the 3 lights were orb like and ranged from a variety of colors from red's to yellows, seemingly glowing as they traveled. eventually the lights began hovering so far and high that they disappeared into the night sky. the closest thing they resembled were sky lanterns (also known as chinese lanterns), though i've never seen these lanterns in person- only in film.
content.summary: Ufo's over los lunas, nm on april 20, 2014 around 10pm

content.detailedDescription:
I was photography lightning outside my home and noticed, after a very intense bolt lit up the interior of a cloud bank, that the blue glow continued for quite some time, i took several pictures which were 8 second exposures that show that the glow remained for quite some time.  i thought it odd, and knew it was not ball lightning, as everything i've read on ball lightning says it always moves and flickers softly.  as the entire interior of the cloud was lit up continuously, as if from a steady light source, i knew it couldn't be lightning.

shortly thereafter, probably less than 5 minutes later, a bright red orb flew from the east in my general direction.  being near an airport i am used to seeing aircraft in the vicinity, however this orb did not have any of the strobes nor other lights usually on aircraft.  it was simply a steady bright red light.  also, it made no noise as it passed by, at first under the clouds and then up and through the clouds towards the area of the blue glow.

as it was passing under and through the clouds i noticed the glow from the light on the clouds, and could make out no discernible shape.  given the cloud cover was very low (1000 ft) i would have expected to see other lights, a shape and engine noise, but there was none.  also, the object flew directly into a thunderstorm, which aircraft never do.

eventually the orb was lost in the clouds, and i never saw it again.  i expected, if it maintained it's course, that i would see it emerge from the clouds, but it did not.

i attempted to take a picture of the orb, but my camera was set to an 8 second exposure, so all i got was a bright squiggly line in the shot.  before i could reset the camera, the object was passing into the clouds.

i will send the pictures i do have as soon as i can.
content.summary: An intense blue glow inside a cloud which was approached by a glowing red orb

content.detailedDescription:
In my friends back yard at dusk, sun was setting but there was still plenty of light, 4 people saw an object. it was larger than a balloon though one witness felt it was a mylar balloon.  seemed more proportional to a small car, was black or dark in color reflecting the sun in the body at one small area which showed it as a flat plane where the reflection was.  it did not tumble like a balloon or float, it has a very constant speed, about 30-40mph and traveled in a distinctly straight line towards the van nuys airport. then when approaching the airport it changed course slightly but directly to travel north out of the perpendicular path of the runways.
the reasoning behind reporting this is:
1.  the speed the object was moving was consistent and faster than a car and never changed though there was no lower wind blowing that evening.

2. the object did not tumble or have weightlessness like a balloon and was close enough to make apparent it was not a heli or plane.  there was no noise.

3.  it rotated slowly on its y axis(y is up) to reveal the setting sun as a reflection on its 'planar' side then held that position

4. when it changed direction it was distinct, but kept a straight line as previously was being traveled.  it was traveling straight and level, with a decent clip of speed.  it never went up or down in altitude, never slowed, and only rotated about 30degrees on the y axis then stopped rotating.  

5.  there was nothing like string or lines hanging from below it, nor was it a grouping of traditional round or sphere like balloons and if it was mylar i would expect the reflection we saw would have been all over its side.  as it rotated on its y axis from what looked like a planar surface to another planar surface that is when we saw the sunset reflected on it.  

we are not sure what it was, but it had control of its own altitude, speed and trajectory which was moving an object of substance and weight with little effort.
content.summary: A car sized object seen travelling in straight line through reseda to van nuys, ca
